text: Twin Sisters () is a 2002 Dutch Luxembourgian World War II drama movie directed by Ben Sombogaart and was based on the 1993 novel The Twins by Tessa de Loo. It stars Ellen Vogel, Gundrun Okras, Thekla Reuten, Nadja Uhl, Betty Schuurman, Jaap Spijkers and was nominated for an Academy Award in 2004. ==Other websites== * Category:2002 drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:2000s Luxembourgian movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ben Sombogaart
title: Twin Sisters (2002 movie)
